item.title: Noah Hawley on ‘Alien: Earth’s’ New Monsters: “Worse Than You Can Imagine”
item.description: The ‘Fargo’ creator returns to FX with a haunting take on the classic science fiction franchise, with brand new creatures along for the ride.

item.title: Noah Hawley on ‘Alien: Earth’s’ New Monsters: “Worse Than You Can Imagine”

item.title: ‘Alien: Earth’ Star Timothy Olyphant Wants Everybody to Relax About Reboots
item.description: As he swaps his cowboy hat for some frosty tips in the Noah Hawley series, the actor discusses the joy of revisiting work, discovering the “sweet spot” of fame and his love for former co-star Walton G

item.title: ‘Alien: Earth’ Review: FX’s Sci-Fi Prequel Is an Intriguingly Ambitious, Eventually Thrilling Journey Into the Semi-Known
item.description: Timothy Olyphant and Sydney Chandler star in the Noah Hawley-created series, which begins with a spaceship crash-landing on our planet and introducing an array of deadly extraterrestrial creatures.

item.title: ‘Alien: Earth’ Review: FX’s Sci-Fi Prequel Is an Intriguingly Ambitious, Eventually Thrilling Journey Into the Semi-Known
item.description: Timothy Olyphant and Sydney Chandler star in the Noah Hawley-created series, which begins with a spaceship crash-landing on our planet and introducing an array of deadly extraterrestrial creatures.

item.title: New ‘Alien: Earth’ Trailer Reveals Monsters Gone Wild After Spaceship With Hybrid Life Forms Crashes
item.description: More clues to the sci-fi world-building are revealed for Noah Hawley’s take on Ridley Scott’s ‘Alien’ universe in the latest teaser before an Aug. 12 bow for the FX series.
